steps.title: Create Your Profile
steps.description: Create your business and user profile with JustPing.AI's intuitive tools. Share these profiles with end users during agent interactions or campaigns for enhanced engagement.

steps.title: Add Users
steps.description: Add users easily to your admin app and assign roles as admins or other users to help manage various aspects of the system effectively.

steps.title: Create Your First Agent
steps.description: Create your first agent. These autonomous agents are powered by workflows and AI to enable end-to-end objective-based user interactions.

steps.title: Integrate Your Messaging Providers
steps.description: Integrate your preferred messaging providers to enhance your communication capabilities. Connect multiple providers and choose the most suitable one.

steps.title: Create Your First Broadcast Template
steps.description: Create Your First Broadcast Template. Use these templates to broadcast messages to users. Templates require approval from platforms like WhatsApp.
